price: He said, “Its knowledge is with my Lord in a Record. My Lord never errs, nor does He forget.”
arabic: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى
